name: Rocksmith 2014 Edition: Remastered - UBI30: 1986 Song Pack
summary: Play "Talk Dirty To Me" by The Poison, “Danger Zone” by Kenny Loggins, “Nobody’s Fool” by Cinderella , “Addicted To Love” by Robert Palmer and "Burning Heart" by Survivor on any electric guitar or bass. Each song includes a new authentic tone.
